metadata.title: CVE-2024-22955 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: swftools 0.9.2 was discovered to contain a stack-buffer-underflowvulnerability via the function parseExpression at swftools/src/swfc.c:2576.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
